bizView:
Having an accident or enduring a catastrophe can be a very stressful thing, but we don't think reporting an insurance claim should be. You can report a claim online in a matter of minutes. The State FarmÂ® claims reporting process is quick and easy.

Do you have a State Farm Auto or Property policy? If so, sign into your account to report a claim. If you don't have an account, registering as a State Farm customer is quick and easy. If you are not a State Farm policyholder, you can report a claim by calling 800-STATE-FARM (800-782-8332) 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Once you log in and submit your claim, a State Farm claims representative will contact you as soon as possible to verify information, ask questions, explain coverage, and process the claim.
entityMock:
public class ClassLazyTypeResolver extends LazyTypeResolver {
  // Predefined resolvers for frequently used classes
  public static final ClassLazyTypeResolver Object = new ClassLazyTypeResolver( Object.class );
  public static final ClassLazyTypeResolver String = new ClassLazyTypeResolver( String.class );
  ... // many more
 
  private final Class _class;
 
  public ClassLazyTypeResolver( Class type ) {
    _class = type;
  }
  
  @Override
  protected IType init() {
    return TypeSystem.get( _class );
  }
  public static java.lang.String getCachedFieldName( Class cls ) {
    String fieldName = cls.getSimpleName();
    try {
      for( Field f: ClassLazyTypeResolver.class.getDeclaredFields() ) {
        if( f.getName().equals( fieldName ) && ((ClassLazyTypeResolver)f.get( null ))._class == cls ) {
          return fieldName;
        }
      }
      return null;
    }
    catch( IllegalAccessException e ) {
      throw new RuntimeException( e );
    }
  }
}
